name: Farsight IT Solutions
overview: Farsight IT Solutions is an acclaimed, globally acknowledged and ISO 9001:2008 accredited IT Solutions provider catering to offshore clients across the United States of America and India. The organization is at the forefront of offshore software development providing bespoke solutions via various powerful and user friendly interfaces. The solutions are aimed at helping clients gain a competitive advantage in the current market place. Farsight blends its technological prowess with flexible and business centric solutions to make business models more competitive and efficient. Some areas Farsight IT specializes in are payroll automation, time office automation, payroll outsourcing services, attendance machines and fixed assets management solutions.
